comment: Tbh I'm not sure where the prior 5 star rating came from bc this is the WORST professor I have ever taken. Grades are 0 or 100 and makes you critique your work 37 times before he gives you a 100 if you get a 0. Also has a major attitude. If you take anything from this post DO NOT TAKE HIM! Unwilling to help you unless it's helping you fail!

Friendly & energetic. All assignments are online with 1-5 due weekly. They're critical thinking assignments, so the amount of time they take varies. Class isn't mandatory, but suggested to build connections. In class, you do 1 out of the few assignments due the next week. He guides you through it & you share answers with multiple other students.
